0: It was a great getaway and we can not wait to come back again soon
The wine tasting events are fun and relaxing
I also get to DJ wedding events all the time and must honestly say that it is one of my favorite venues to work at for many different reasons
The hotel is large with open areas which provide nice views within the hotel
I played golf twice at the Woodlands Course and it was in immaculate condition
The atrium area is a massive 3story space under skylights
Rooms and Spas are great as well
the wine tasting was a great experience
Our server was Alex from Romania
1: If this is your first begin the wine tasting 30 min before the winery tour
I chose this place to propose and I was not disappointed
I would take the wine tour and tasting there again they have some really good wine I would eat at the Irish Pub
Finally the drapery in Room 503 needs to be mended
For this to be a winery resort price of 6200 for 2days
Went to there bar ordered a few drinks there were 4 of us they over charged us by 5 drinks
About 15 minutes later I went back to the charcuterie station and noticed that nothing had been done
We begged the carver the server and the “ manager ” to please find some rare or medium rare cuts for us but they could not find any
There is also a hilton on grounds with very good prices about 180 a night with a double queen
I would not return as it ’s not my kind of place but others may like it
